messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Central April Tomb Uniform. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The CMO isnt here to make this message so i gonna do this: SET YOUR SUIT SENSORS TO MAX!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Central April Tomb Uniform. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: sorry about that we accidently turned on your light field dampeners we will fix it momentarily

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Al-l c-cime is-s n-nao l-l-l-leg-g-gel-l l-let-t-t-t t-th-he pr-ruge b-begen-n-n t-t-t-th-he ai is-s n-now-w all-low-w-w-wed-d t-to k-kil-l

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: crime is not legal captain is not above spacelaw

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Central April Tomb Uniform door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to your infection there will be no shuttle have a nice day...

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.
